titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 40) to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives concerning the receipt of gifts from lobbyists and other persons, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Bryant (TX). Petition No: 104-4.

bill.summary: 4/3/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. Res. 40 (House of Representatives rules concerning gifts).
